text: And let these words, 8. 59 Gr. as.which I have prayed before the Lord our God, be 8. 59 Gr. approaching.near to the Lord our God day and night, to maintain the cause of thy servant, and the cause of thy people Israel 8. 59 Gr. a thing or word of a day in a day of a year. But Alex. reads ἡμέρᾳ αὐτοῦ, which agrees with the Heb.for ever.
